name: Stamford Plaza Sydney Airport

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Good location to Sydney airport - caught a shuttle before read the note here about taking a cab but all OK. Good clean room - nice size & good shower. Staff on Reception were friendly & good check in was not bad time.
reviews.title: Good location to airport

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Hey what a 5 Star Place, and right next the the Domestic Sydney Airport, for us also. International not that far away as well. The whole atmosphere was tops. The room, the Dinner, the service and the Price was all perfect.
reviews.title: So close to airport, So 5 star......

reviews.text: Used Stamford for overnight stopover between flights. Shuttle bus to hotel was handy, as taxi rank queue was a mile long. Quick and efficient checkin. Room of good standard, shower in bath is a bit passe but was ok.
reviews.title: Good transit at Sydney airport

reviews.text: I waited an hour at the airport for a smelly bus, unprofessional driver and terrible shuttle trip. Took longer to get from the airport to the "airport" hotel (total one amd a half hours) than flying from Melbourne. Excuses at the front desk of "using another company" not good enough.
reviews.title: Do NOT get the shuttle bus.

reviews.text: Can't complain about this hotel at all. Loved every bit of it. Has a great gym and pool.
reviews.title: Great Hotel....right beside airport.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stopped of here for a 1 night stay before flying out next afternoon. It is an ideal location especially if fly domestic as you can walk to the terminal, we were international so had to get the shuttle bus which is very frequent.
reviews.title: Great location for Airport

reviews.text: The rooms were very comfortable and large for a standard room as we had, we ate in the restaurant at night and found the meal to be excellent.
reviews.title: Friendly and convenient

reviews.text: Merc
reviews.title: Good value but overheated!

reviews.text: Stayed recently for a night before flying to Europe.Comfortable and quiet room, an efficient shuttle bus.
reviews.title: A quick trip to the early morning flight!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Generous buffet breakfast with the daily newspaper. Even enjoyed a swim and spa before long haul travel which was great!
reviews.title: Comfortable, convenient but Lacks Something
Lovely night at the Stamford
reviews.text: We had a change of flight plans at the last minute and stayed here quite by chance.
The rates were really reasonable given the fact that Sydney is really expensive and we could not book in advance.
reviews.title: Convenient and Cosy

reviews.text: The staff were really helpful. The room was large and really well appointed.
reviews.title: Convenient and Comfortable

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Close to the city. We will stay again.
reviews.title: Very handy for the airport

reviews.text: Stayed here the night before flying back to Asia. Very convenient location near airport but not too far from city and shopping too. Lovely big room with large windy and comfy bed. Overall better than I expected as the price was much lower than any room I could afford even close to inner west or CBD ($150 vs $200 for other cheapest 4 star).
reviews.title: great convenient location

reviews.text: This is a great hotel very close to the airport. It is clean, very comfortable and the staff were extremely friendly and helpful. We never used the pool but it looked nice. It is within walking distance of the airport and is a 10 minute walk to the metro which will take you to the city center. You could very easily stay here on a sighting seeing city holiday and get the train in and out to the city. Only drawback was the price of the hotel. However you get what you pay for. We only stayed here one night but it was a very pleasant stay and I would highly recommend it to anyone visiting Sydney.
reviews.title: Great hotel very close to the airport

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed for one night on route to Fiji. I was expecting it to be a bit grotty, but was pleasantly surprised. Room was clean and inviting. Bathroom was a bit tired, but overall I thought it was good value for money when you are looking for a place to have a sleep. We were also lucky enough to get into the room early which really helped us as we were desperate for a shower. Would return and also recommend you use the shuttle service - quick and convenient. Reception staff could have been a little friendlier, but we did arrive really early. I was also expecting it to be noisy, but it wasn't. So definitely would stay there again if I was in transit and just need a bed for the night.
reviews.title: Convenient and Clean

reviews.text: This is a nice hotel, with better than average rooms. Staff were pleasant and accommodating. The location is good - only 5 minutes' to the domestic terminal. It's maybe not quite the standard of other Stamford's I've stayed in, but certainly a very pleasant hotel.
reviews.title: Better than average airport hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We spent two separate nights here, between flight to and from the Great Barrier Reef. The shuttle between terminals & the hotel are very frequent and efficient. The room was large and clean with comfortable bed. The maids doing housekeeping around 8:30PM could have closed the utility doors more quietly, as they would bang shut and our room was directly across the hallway from those doors.
reviews.title: Nice place for a quick trip to airport

reviews.text: Right next to the hotel is a pub that serves great burgers and light meals. And in the mornings, there is a small grocery store where one can get yogurt, fruit, & mueslix for one's breakfast.
reviews.title: Perfect Airport Hotel

aka: Stamford Plaza Sydney Airport Hotel Mascot
